Tech Sector (TCA Members) - Example Role: Quartile 1 band include, on average, a median entry-level software engineer, a median entry-level hardware engineer, a median entry-level data scientist, or a 25th percentile senior data science manager.

Low-mid quartile roles include, on average, an 25th percentile senior business development, a median senior marketing operations, a median entry-level sales engineer, or a 25th percentile senior data science manager.
Mid-upper quartile roles include, on average, a median senior data science manager, a 25th percentile senior sales engineer, a median senior security analyst, or a 90th percentile senior recruiter.

This top-paying quartile would contain high-level leadership roles including C-Suite and Vice President-level executives as well as top-tier technical roles like a 75th percentile senior software engineer, a 75th percentile senior data scientist.
